name: OpenLive NFT
description: OPENLIVE NFT is the pioneer platform in the NFT Marketplace which has been built for exchanging NFT tokens such as popular NFT platforms: Rarible, Opensea, Foundation, etc. We created an NFT market and NFT tokens evolution which is the only transparent and verifiable piece of information scarcity in the blockchain. We develop NFTs by mathematical verification of individual certificates or licenses. Our non-fungible tokens are used as collectibles and in-game items. NFT tokens (NFTs) are digital assets of unique value, and they are different from their crypto counterparts.
